Verses: 1 paralogaraajyam Veettejamaanaagiya Oru Manushanukku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Avan Than Thiraatchaththottaththukku Velaiyaatkalai Amarththa Adhikaalaiyile Purappattaan.
2 velaiyaatkaludan Naalondrukku Oru Panam Koolipesi, Avargalaith Than Thiraatchaththottaththukku Anuppinaan.
3 moondraam Mani Velaiyilum Avan Purappattuppoi, Kadaiththeruvile Summaa Nirkira Veru Silaraikkandu:
4 neengalum Thiraatchaththottaththukkup Pongal; Niyaayamaanapadi Ungalukku Kooli Koduppen Endraan; Avargalum Ponaargal.
5 marupadiyum, Aaraam Onpadhaam Manivelaiyilum Avan Poi Appadiye Seydhaan.
6 padhinoraam Manivelaiyilum Avanpoi, Summaa Nirkira Veru Silaraikkandu: Neengal Pagal Muzhuvadhum Inge Summaa Nirkiradhenna Endru Kettaan.
7 adharku Avargal: Oruvanum Engalukku Velaiyidavillai Endraargal. Avan Avargalai Nokki: Neengalum Thiraatchaththottaththukkup Pongal. Niyaayamaanapadi Kooli Petrukkolveergal Endraan.

8 saayangaalaththil, Thiraatchaththottaththukku Ejamaan Than Kaariyakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Velaiyaatkalai Azhaiththu, Pindhivandhavargal Thodangi Mundhivandhavargalvaraikkum Avargalukkuk Kooli Kodu Endraan.
9 appozhudhu Padhinoraam Manivelaiyil Velaiyamarththappattavargal Vandhu Aalukku Ovvoru Panam Vaanginaargal.
10 mundhi Amarththappattavargal Vandhu, Thangalukku Adhiga Kooli Kidaikkum Endru Enninaargal, Avargalum Aalukku Ovvoru Panam Vaanginaargal.
11 vaangikkondu Veettejamaanai Nokki:
12 pindhivandhavargalaagiya Ivargal Oru Mani Neramaaththiram Velai Seydhaargal; Pagalin Kashtaththaiyum Veyilin Ushnaththaiyum Sagiththa Engalukku Ivargalai Samamaakkineere Endru Murumuruththaargal.
13 avargalil Oruvanukku Avan Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Sinegidhane, Naan Unakku Aniyaayanjeyyavillai; Nee Ennidaththil Oru Panaththukku Sammadhikkavillaiyaa?
14 unnudaiyadhai Nee Vaangikkondu Po, Unakkuk Koduththadhu Polap Pindhi Vandhavanaagiya Ivanukkum Koduppadhu Ennudaiya Ishtam.
15 ennudaiyadhai En Ishtappadich Seyya Enakku Adhikaaramillaiyaa? Naan Thayaalanaayirukkirapadiyaal, Nee Vankannanaayirukkalaamaa Endraan.
16 ivvidhamaaga, Pindhinor Mundhinoraayum, Mundhinor Pindhinoraayum Iruppaargal; Azhaikkappattavargal Anegar, Therindhukollappattavargalo Silar Endraar.
17 yesu Erusalemukkuppogumpodhu, Vazhiyile Pannirandu Seesharaiyum Thaniye Azhaiththu:
18 idho, Erusalemukkuppogirom; Manushakumaaran Piradhaana Aasaariyaridaththilum Vedhapaarakaridaththilum Oppukkodukkappaduvaar; Avargal Avarai Marana Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerththu,
19 avaraip Pariyaasampannavum, Vaarinaal Adikkavum, Siluvaiyil Araiyavum Purajaadhiyaaridaththil Oppukkoduppaargal; Aagilum Moondraam Naalile Uyirode Ezhundhiruppaar Endraar.
20 appozhudhu, Sepadheyuvin Kumaararudaiya Thaai Avaridaththil Vandhu Avaraip Panindhukondu: Ummidaththil Oru Vinnappam Pannavendum Endraal.

21 avar Avalai Nokki: Unakku Enna Vendum Endru Kettaar. Adharku Aval: Ummudaiya Raajyaththile En Kumaararaagiya Ivviranduperil Oruvan Umadhu Valadhu Paarisaththilum, Oruvan Umadhu Idadhupaarisaththilum Utkaarndhirukkumpadi Arul Seyyavendum Endraal.

22 yesu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Kettukkollugiradhu Innadhu Endru Ungalukkuth Theriyavillai. Naan Kudikkum Paaththiraththil Neengal Kudikkavum, Naan Perum Snaanaththai Neengal Peravum Koodumaa Endraar. Adharku Avargal Koodum Endraargal.

23 avar Avargalai Nokki: En Paaththiraththil Neengal Kudippeergal, Naan Perum Snaanaththaiyum Neengal Peruveergal; Aanaalum, En Valadhu Paarisaththilum Idadhu Paarisaththilum Utkaarndhirukkumpadi En Pidhaavinaal Evargalukku Aayaththampannappattirukkiradho Avargalukkeyallaamal, Matroruvarukkum Adhai Aruluvadhu En Kaariyamalla Endraar.
24 matrap Paththupperum Adhaikkettu, Andha Irandu Sagodharar Perilum Erichchalaanaargal.

25 appozhudhu, Yesu Avargalai Kittavarachcheydhu: Purajaadhiyaarudaiya Adhikaarigal Avargalai Irumaappaai Aalugiraargal Endrum, Periyavargal Avargal Mel Kadinamaai Adhikaaranjeluththugiraargal Endrum, Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
26 ungalukkulle Appadi Irukkalaagaadhu; Ungalil Evanaagilum Periyavanaayirukka Virumbinaal, Avan Ungalukkup Panividaikkaaranaayirukkakkadavan.
27 ungalil Evanaagilum Mudhanmaiyaanavanaayirukka Virumbinaal, Avan Ungalukku Oozhiyakkaaranaayirukkakkadavan.
28 appadiye, Manushakumaaranum Oozhiyangollumpadi Varaamal, Oozhiyanjeyyavum, Anegarai Meetkum Porulaakath Thammudaiya Jeevanaikkodukkavum Vandhaar Endraar.
29 avargal Erikovilirundhu Purappattup Pogaiyil, Thiralaana Janangal Avarukkup Pin Sendraargal.
30 appozhudhu Vazhiyaruge Utkaarndhirundha Irandu Kurudar, Yesu Avvazhiye Varugiraar Endru Kelvippattu: Aandavare, Dhaaveedhin Kumaarane, Engalukku Irangum Endru Kooppittaargal.
31 avargal Pesaadhirukkumpadi Janangal Avargalai Adhattinaargal. Avargalo: Aandavare, Dhaaveedhin Kumaarane, Engalukku Irangum Endru Adhigamaaik Kooppittaargal.
32 yesu Nindru, Avargalaith Thammidaththil Azhaiththu: Naan Ungalukku Enna Seyyavendum Endrirukkireergal Endraar.
33 adharku Avargal: Aandavare, Engal Kangalaith Thirakkavendum Endraargal.
34 yesu Manadhurugi, Avargal Kangalaith Thottaar; Udane Avargal Paarvaiyadaindhu, Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.
